name: 蘇評揮
objective:
智能車輛將成為車輛產業之主流產品，自駕化、電能化、資通化等相關技術理論、實務設計等訓練與運用情境規劃為此課程重點。
Technology Introduction and System Design of an Autonomous Electric Vehicle are the focus contents, and which will be included as follows.
1.　　Technological Trend and Industrial Practice: ACE mobility on demand; Automation, Electrification, and Connection made Google, Tesla, and Uber driving the future of Automotive Industry.  
2.　　System Design: Scenario drives the innovative business model to develop the new vehicle requirements for an Autonomous Vehicle System design; chassis, powertrain, sensors, communication devices, and infrastructure adoption enabling technologies.
3.　　Key Components:
a.　　Automation: Radar, Lidar, EPS, AEB, CPU, and SI,
b.　　Electrification: Motor, Drive, Battery, ICE, BEV, HEV, FcHEV, and Controls,
c.　　Connectivity: Telcom, DSRC, 4~5G, SLAM, Big Data, and Infrastructure.
4.　　Case Study and Group Presentation:
a.　　Automotive supply chain innovation from manufacturing to solution-based ACE mobility services,
b.　　5 Fleets can be selected for the group studies and for presentation; Elderly community, Campus Shuttle, Tour Hot Spots Shuttle, Industrial Park, and Short Distance e-Taxi.
schedule:
Week 1~3: Technological Trend and Industrial Practice of an ACE mobility on demand. 
Week 4~8: System Design: from Scenario to the new vehicle requirements for an Autonomous Vehicle System design.
Week 9: Mid-term test and group presentation.
Week 10~14:  Key Components Technologies.
Week 15~16: Case Study and Group Theme Consolidation.
Week 17-18: Final Test and Presentation.
scorePolicy:
Mid-term presentation:20%
Mid-term test: 20%
Final presentation: 35%
Final test: 25%
materials: Class notes will be prepared by the Professor and handed it out by PDF bi-weekly before the class.
